items.title: McIlroy stays in contention as Lowry leads charge into Dubai Invitational final round
items.summary: Rory McIlroy gave himself an outside chance of winning the Dubai Invitational following a three-under-par 68 on Saturday.

Senegal accuse Morocco of putting ‚Äòplayers in danger‚Äô before Afcon final
items.summary: FSF protests about security and accommodation concerns Training facility and insufficient ticket worries also raised The Senegalese Football Federation (FSF) has accused Morocco‚Äôs local organising committee of undermining their preparations for Sunday‚Äôs Africa Cup of Nations final against the hosts. In a statement on social media, the FSF protested about a lack of adequate security on arrival, inadequate accommodation, confusion over training facilities and insufficient tickets being provided for Senegal fans. Having beaten Egypt in Wednesday‚Äôs semi-final in Tangier, the Senegal squad made the 75-minute journey south to the capital on the Al-Boraq high-speed train. On arrival in Rabat they were surrounded by fans and local people demanding selfies and videos released on social media show them being jostled as they made their way through the station to the team bus. Continue reading...

items.title: Gasperini ziet Malen als spits: 'Daar speelt hij het liefst'
items.summary: Gian Piero Gasperini heeft bevestigd dat Donyell Malen zondag kan debuteren voor AS Roma. De trainer van de Romeinse club ziet in de winteraanwinst een spits. 'In beide benen heeft hij een krachtig schot.'

items.title: Premier League live updates: Man United host Man City in first game under Carrick
Van Oevelen: 'Het was niet het goede moment om al naar Ajax te gaan'
items.summary: Kayne van Oevelen (22) keept een sterk seizoen bij FC Volendam en speelt zich daarmee in de kijker bij andere clubs. Ajax heeft de doelman al een tijdje op de radar staan en probeerde hem vorig jaar nog binnen te halen. Van Oevelen werd echter niet enthousiast van de Amsterdamse toenaderingspoging.

items.title: Utrecht, Groningen en Eagles informeren bij Ajax naar Edvardsen
items.summary: De interesse in Oliver Edvardsen komt langzaam op gang. Vanuit de Eredivisie hebben FC Utrecht, FC Groningen en Go Ahead Eagles navraag gedaan naar de Noorse aanvaller van Ajax. Zij kregen te horen dat Edvardsen op dit moment niet te huur is.

items.summary: Zaterdag staan NAC Breda en NEC Nijmegen tegenover elkaar in het Rat Verlegh stadion en cijferman Bart Frouws verwacht dat het publiek kan rekenen op doelpunten.

Manager of women‚Äôs football club banned for 12 years after bombarding players with indecent images
items.summary: FA finds 23 of 24 charges against Ryan Hamilton were proven Punishment sends ‚Äòa clear message‚Äô misconduct ‚Äònot tolerated‚Äô The former manager of a fourth-tier women‚Äôs team has been banned by the Football Association from all involvement in the sport for 12 years after he sent indecent images of himself to players and a member of staff as well as subjecting them to sexually inappropriate behaviour. Ryan Hamilton, who left his role as Sutton Coldfield Town Women‚Äôs manager in November 2024, was found to have sent photographs of his penis to a player and a staff member via social media, as well as to have sent naked or partially naked photographs of himself to two of the other players, and to have sent a player a video of himself masturbating. Continue reading...

items.title: 'We can play for two titles' - Rohl eyes Rangers double after cup rout
items.summary: Danny Rohl has targeted a league and cup double after Bojan Miovski's hat-trick helped a much-changed Rangers side to a 5-0 Scottish Cup win over Annan Athletic at Ibrox.
